panels.description: Last processed for a specified time period
panels.title: Epoch

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    val_nos_name as Operator,
    SUM(a) as All,
    SUM(p) as Proposed,
    SUM(m) as Missed
  FROM
  (
    SELECT
      val_nos_name,
      count(block_proposed) as a,
      IF(block_proposed = 0, count(block_proposed), 0) as m,
      IF(block_proposed = 1, count(block_proposed), 0) as p
    FROM stats.validators_summary
    WHERE is_proposer = 1 AND val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND (epoch <= ${epoch_number_var} AND epoch > (${epoch_number_var} - ${epochs}))
    GROUP BY val_nos_name, block_proposed
  )
  GROUP by val_nos_name
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    val_nos_name as Operator,
    SUM(a) as All,
    SUM(p) as Proposed,
    SUM(m) as Missed
  FROM
  (
    SELECT
      val_nos_name,
      count(block_proposed) as a,
      IF(block_proposed = 0, count(block_proposed), 0) as m,
      IF(block_proposed = 1, count(block_proposed), 0) as p
    FROM stats.validators_summary
    WHERE is_proposer = 1 AND val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND (epoch <= 157218 AND epoch > (157218 - 1))
    GROUP BY val_nos_name, block_proposed
  )
  GROUP by val_nos_name

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

  )

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    sum(a) as User,
    (32 * ${epochs} - User) as Other
  FROM
  (
    SELECT
      count(block_proposed) as a
    FROM stats.validators_summary
    WHERE is_proposer = 1 AND val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND (epoch <= ${epoch_number_var} AND epoch > (${epoch_number_var} - ${epochs}))
    GROUP BY block_proposed
  )
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    sum(a) as User,
    (32 * 1 - User) as Other
  FROM
  (
    SELECT
      count(block_proposed) as a
    FROM stats.validators_summary
    WHERE is_proposer = 1 AND val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND (epoch <= 157261 AND epoch > (157261 - 1))
    GROUP BY block_proposed
  )

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    val_nos_name as Operator,
    SUM(a) as All,
    SUM(g) as Good,
    SUM(b) as Bad,
    AVG(ap) as "Avg participation"
  FROM
  (
    SELECT
      val_nos_name,
      IF(sync_percent >= 0, count(sync_percent), 0) as a,
      IF(sync_percent >= (${chain_sync_avg_participation} - ${sync_participation_distance_var}), count(sync_percent), 0) as g,
      IF(sync_percent < (${chain_sync_avg_participation} - ${sync_participation_distance_var}), count(sync_percent), 0) as b,
      IF(sync_percent >= 0, avg(sync_percent), 0) as ap
      FROM
        stats.validators_summary
      WHERE is_sync = 1 AND val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND (epoch <= ${epoch_number_var} AND epoch > (${epoch_number_var} - ${epochs}))
    GROUP BY val_nos_name, sync_percent
  )
  GROUP by val_nos_name
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    val_nos_name as Operator,
    SUM(a) as All,
    SUM(g) as Good,
    SUM(b) as Bad,
    AVG(ap) as "Avg participation"
  FROM
  (
    SELECT
      val_nos_name,
      IF(sync_percent >= 0, count(sync_percent), 0) as a,
      IF(sync_percent >= (97.607421875 - 0), count(sync_percent), 0) as g,
      IF(sync_percent < (97.607421875 - 0), count(sync_percent), 0) as b,
      IF(sync_percent >= 0, avg(sync_percent), 0) as ap
      FROM
        stats.validators_summary
      WHERE is_sync = 1 AND val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND (epoch <= 157255 AND epoch > (157255 - 1))
    GROUP BY val_nos_name, sync_percent
  )
  GROUP by val_nos_name

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT

    (512 * ${epochs} - User) as Other
  FROM
  (
    SELECT
      count(sync_percent) as u
      FROM
        stats.validators_summary
      WHERE is_sync = 1 AND val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND (epoch <= ${epoch_number_var} AND epoch > (${epoch_number_var} - ${epochs}))

    SUM(u) as User,
    (512 * 1 - User) as Other
  FROM

      count(sync_percent) as u
      FROM
        stats.validators_summary
      WHERE is_sync = 1 AND val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND (epoch <= 157261 AND epoch > (157261 - 1))
  )

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    val_nos_name as Operator,
    SUM(p) as Perfect,
    SUM(i) as "High inc. delay",
    SUM(bh) as "Bad head",
    SUM(bt) as "Bad target",
    SUM(bs) as "Bad source",
    SUM(m) as Missed
  FROM
  (
    SELECT
      val_nos_name,
      IF((att_happened = 1) AND (att_inc_delay = 1) AND (att_valid_head = 1) AND (att_valid_target = 1) AND (att_valid_source = 1), count(), 0) as p,
      IF((att_happened = 1) AND (att_inc_delay > 1) AND (att_valid_head = 1) AND (att_valid_target = 1) AND (att_valid_source = 1), count(), 0) as i,
      IF(att_valid_head = 0, count(), 0) as bh,
      IF(att_valid_target = 0, count(), 0) as bt,
      IF(att_valid_source = 0, count(), 0) as bs,
      IF(att_happened = 0, count(), 0) as m
    FROM stats.validators_summary
    WHERE val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND (epoch <= ${epoch_number_var} AND epoch > (${epoch_number_var} - ${epochs}))
    GROUP BY val_nos_name, att_happened, att_inc_delay, att_valid_head, att_valid_target, att_valid_source
  )
  GROUP by val_nos_name
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    val_nos_name as Operator,
    SUM(p) as Perfect,
    SUM(i) as "High inc. delay",
    SUM(bh) as "Bad head",
    SUM(bt) as "Bad target",
    SUM(bs) as "Bad source",
    SUM(m) as Missed
  FROM
  (
    SELECT
      val_nos_name,
      IF((att_happened = 1) AND (att_inc_delay = 1) AND (att_valid_head = 1) AND (att_valid_target = 1) AND (att_valid_source = 1), count(), 0) as p,
      IF((att_happened = 1) AND (att_inc_delay > 1) AND (att_valid_head = 1) AND (att_valid_target = 1) AND (att_valid_source = 1), count(), 0) as i,
      IF(att_valid_head = 0, count(), 0) as bh,
      IF(att_valid_target = 0, count(), 0) as bt,
      IF(att_valid_source = 0, count(), 0) as bs,
      IF(att_happened = 0, count(), 0) as m
    FROM stats.validators_summary
    WHERE val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND (epoch <= 157472 AND epoch > (157472 - 1))
    GROUP BY val_nos_name, att_happened, att_inc_delay, att_valid_head, att_valid_target, att_valid_source
  )
  GROUP by val_nos_name

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

    SUM(p) as Perfect,

      IF(att_valid_head = 0, count(), 0) as bh,
      IF(att_valid_target = 0, count(), 0) as bt,
      IF(att_valid_source = 0, count(), 0) as bs,
      IF(att_happened = 0, count(), 0) as m
    FROM stats.validators_summary
    WHERE val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND (epoch <= ${epoch_number_var} AND epoch > (${epoch_number_var} - ${epochs}))
    GROUP BY att_inc_delay, att_happened, att_valid_head, att_valid_target, att_valid_source
  )
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    SUM(p) as Perfect,
    SUM(i) as "High inc. delay",
    SUM(bh) as "Bad head",
    SUM(bt) as "Bad target",
    SUM(bs) as "Bad source",
    SUM(m) as Missed
  FROM
  (
    SELECT
      IF((att_happened = 1) AND (att_inc_delay = 1) AND (att_valid_head = 1) AND (att_valid_target = 1) AND (att_valid_source = 1), count(), 0) as p,
      IF((att_happened = 1) AND (att_inc_delay > 1) AND (att_valid_head = 1) AND (att_valid_target = 1) AND (att_valid_source = 1), count(), 0) as i,
      IF(att_valid_head = 0, count(), 0) as bh,
      IF(att_valid_target = 0, count(), 0) as bt,
      IF(att_valid_source = 0, count(), 0) as bs,
      IF(att_happened = 0, count(), 0) as m
    FROM stats.validators_summary
    WHERE val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND (epoch <= 157473 AND epoch > (157473 - 1))
    GROUP BY att_inc_delay, att_happened, att_valid_head, att_valid_target, att_valid_source
  )

panels.title: Number of validators with negative delta

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  current.val_balance - previous.val_balance AS GWei,
  current.val_nos_name as Operator,
  current.val_id as Validator
FROM 
  (
    SELECT val_balance, val_id, val_nos_id, val_nos_name 
    FROM stats.validators_summary 
    WHERE 
      val_status != 'pending_queued' AND 
      val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND
      epoch = ${epoch_number_var}
  ) AS current
LEFT JOIN
  (
    SELECT val_balance, val_id, val_nos_id, val_nos_name 
    FROM stats.validators_summary 
    WHERE 
      val_status != 'pending_queued' AND 
      val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND
      epoch = ${epoch_number_var} - 6
  ) AS previous
ON
  previous.val_nos_id = current.val_nos_id AND 
  previous.val_id = current.val_id
ORDER BY GWei ASC
LIMIT 100
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  current.val_balance - previous.val_balance AS GWei,
  current.val_nos_name as Operator,
  current.val_id as Validator
FROM 
  (
    SELECT val_balance, val_id, val_nos_id, val_nos_name 
    FROM stats.validators_summary 
    WHERE 
      val_status != 'pending_queued' AND 
      val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND
      epoch = 157259
  ) AS current
LEFT JOIN
  (
    SELECT val_balance, val_id, val_nos_id, val_nos_name 
    FROM stats.validators_summary 
    WHERE 
      val_status != 'pending_queued' AND 
      val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND
      epoch = 157259 - 6
  ) AS previous
ON
  previous.val_nos_id = current.val_nos_id AND 
  previous.val_id = current.val_id
ORDER BY GWei ASC
LIMIT 100

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  block_to_propose as Block,
  val_nos_name as Operator,
  val_id as Validator
FROM stats.validators_summary
WHERE is_proposer = 1 AND val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND block_proposed = 0 AND (epoch <= ${epoch_number_var} AND epoch >= (${epoch_number_var} - ${epochs}))
ORDER BY block_to_propose DESC, val_id
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  block_to_propose as Block,
  val_nos_name as Operator,
  val_id as Validator
FROM stats.validators_summary
WHERE is_proposer = 1 AND val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND block_proposed = 0 AND (epoch <= 157259 AND epoch >= (157259 - 2))
ORDER BY block_to_propose DESC, val_id

panels.title: Number of validators with missed proposals

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    sync_percent as Percent,
    val_nos_name as Operator,
    val_id as Validator
FROM
    stats.validators_summary
WHERE is_sync = 1 AND val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND epoch = ${epoch_number_var} AND sync_percent < (${chain_sync_avg_participation} - ${sync_participation_distance_var})
ORDER BY sync_percent
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    sync_percent as Percent,
    val_nos_name as Operator,
    val_id as Validator
FROM
    stats.validators_summary
WHERE is_sync = 1 AND val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND epoch = 157269 AND sync_percent < (98.13232421875 - 0)
ORDER BY sync_percent

panels.title: Number of validators with sync participation less average

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  count() as Fails,
  val_nos_name as Operator,
  val_id as Validator
FROM (
    SELECT
      val_id,
      val_nos_name
    FROM stats.validators_summary
    WHERE att_happened = 0 AND val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND
    (epoch <= ${epoch_number_var} AND epoch > (${epoch_number_var} - ${epochs}))
    ORDER BY val_id
)
GROUP BY val_id, val_nos_name
ORDER BY Fails DESC, val_id
LIMIT 100
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  count() as Fails,
  val_nos_name as Operator,
  val_id as Validator
FROM (
    SELECT
      val_id,
      val_nos_name
    FROM stats.validators_summary
    WHERE att_happened = 0 AND val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND
    (epoch <= 157474 AND epoch > (157474 - 1))
    ORDER BY val_id
)
GROUP BY val_id, val_nos_name
ORDER BY Fails DESC, val_id
LIMIT 100

panels.title: Number of MISSED attestations (${epochs} epochs range)
Number of validators with MISSED attestation

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:

  count() as Fails,
  val_nos_name as Operator,
  val_id as Validator
FROM (
    SELECT
      val_id,
      val_nos_name
    FROM stats.validators_summary
    WHERE att_happened = 1 AND att_inc_delay > 1 AND val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND
    (epoch <= ${epoch_number_var} AND epoch > (${epoch_number_var} - ${epochs}))
    ORDER BY val_id
)
GROUP BY val_id, val_nos_name
ORDER BY Fails DESC, val_id
LIMIT 100

  count() as Fails,
  val_nos_name as Operator,
  val_id as Validator
FROM (
    SELECT
      val_id,
      val_nos_name
    FROM stats.validators_summary
    WHERE att_happened = 1 AND att_inc_delay > 1 AND val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND
    (epoch <= 157474 AND epoch > (157474 - 1))
    ORDER BY val_id
)
GROUP BY val_id, val_nos_name
ORDER BY Fails DESC, val_id
LIMIT 100

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    val_nos_name as Operator,
    val_id as Validator
FROM stats.validators_summary
WHERE (val_status == 'active_slashed' OR val_status == 'exited_slashed' OR val_slashed == 1) AND val_nos_id IS NOT NULL and epoch = ${epoch_number_var}
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    val_nos_name as Operator,
    val_id as Validator
FROM stats.validators_summary
WHERE (val_status == 'active_slashed' OR val_status == 'exited_slashed' OR val_slashed == 1) AND val_nos_id IS NOT NULL and epoch = 157282

list.description: Sync participation distance down from Blockchain average
list.label: Sync participation distance down from chain avg
list.name: sync_participation_distance_var

list.definition: WITH epoch_range AS ( SELECT ((${__to:date:seconds} - ${__from:date:seconds}) / 384)::int as val ) SELECT IF (val = 0, 1, val) from epoch_range
list.label: Epoch range
list.name: epochs
list.query: WITH epoch_range AS ( SELECT ((${__to:date:seconds} - ${__from:date:seconds}) / 384)::int as val ) SELECT IF (val = 0, 1, val) from epoch_range
